mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND MEMBER_PW = #{pw} AND MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY,MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = #{member_name} AND MEMBER_PHONE = #{member_phone} AND MEMBER_BIRTH = #{member_birth}

SELECT F.FREE_BOARD_NO, F.FREE_TITLE, F.FREE_WRITER, F.FREE_CONTENT, F.FREE_REGDATE, F.FREE_DELFLAG, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM FREE_BOARD F, DONCAR_MEMBER M WHERE F.FREE_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NICKNAME ORDER BY FREE_BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{mail_addr}
mapper.update: UPDATE DONCAR_MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = #{member_pw} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
mapper.select:
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY,MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE
MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{member_id}||'%' AND
MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{member_nickname}||'%' AND
MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{member_name}||'%' AND
MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONCAR_MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE) VALUES (MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_name}, #{member_pw}, 'USER','N', 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE DONCAR_MEMBER SET MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_MONEY,MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ROLL, MEMBER_DRIVEACC, MEMBER_DELFLAG, MEMBER_REGDATE FROM DONCAR_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} AND MEMBER_PW = #{memeber_id}
